function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low pollutant concentration due to low emitting materials used","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation of pollutant levels in typical office conditions","Mitigation":"Use of standardized emitting materials for accurate simulation of pollutant levels","Technologies":"Standardized pollutant emitting materials, pollutant generators","People":"Researchers, environmental scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental testing facilities"},{"Description":"Use of toluene as the target VOC for study","Impact":"Potential exposure to toluene and other volatile organic compounds (VOCs)","Mitigation":"Use of proper ventilation and personal protective equipment (PPE) when handling toluene and other VOCs","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, PPE for handling chemicals","People":"Research staff, laboratory workers","Owner":"Research institutions, laboratories"},{"Description":"Continuous monitoring of single pass efficiency until October 2009","Impact":"Lack of data for long-term performance of the botanical filter beyond October 2009","Mitigation":"Extend the monitoring period to gather additional data on long-term performance","Technologies":"Data logging systems, monitoring sensors","People":"Maintenance staff, research team","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental testing facilities"}]}
